comment.author: 70251312@N00
comment._content: John Purroy Mitchel, Mayor of New York City. LOC: remember that Mitchel spelled his last name with a single "L," even if Bain didn't.

comment.author: 70251312@N00
comment._content:
Other Bain/LOC photos of Mitchel are over here:
[http://www.flickr.com/photos/library_of_congress/4445872456/]

comment.author: 33593953@N02
comment._content: Thanks to both of you for the biographical information and spelling alert. We have several other pictures relating to Mitchel's life and death that display in the Prints & Photographs Online Catalog, including some Bain photos where he (or we) got the spelling right!: www.loc.gov/pictures/search/?q=john%20purroy%20mitchel&am... We'll adjust the information when we update the description.
